channel.title: ::pickup *cmon type it again? WTF?

item.title: ::pickup *cmon type it again? WTF?
item.dc:creator: @strengthxlx strengthxlx
item.description:
@strengthxlx wrote:

that only changes the id you can spawn. Most likely, you have maxplayeramount set to 999m, so try using ::pickup 0995 999999999

item.title: ::pickup *cmon type it again? WTF?
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

[quote=“fr3sh_aka_clutch, post:1, topic:185929”]how do i make it to where when i use ::pickup it dont pop up saying cmon type it again… like when i use ::pickup 0995 2147000000 … it gives me nothing and says the same thing…

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }[/quote]

replace it with this

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); }

then you can pick up the new items but youll have to add an extra 0 like
::pickup 00995 1000
::pickup 00085 1

and so on

Read full topic

item.title: ::pickup *cmon type it again? WTF?
item.dc:creator: @fr3sh_aka_clutch fr3sh_aka_clutch
item.description:
@fr3sh_aka_clutch wrote:

how do i make it to where when i use ::pickup it dont pop up saying cmon type it again… like when i use ::pickup 0995 2147000000 … it gives me nothing and says the same thing…

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist"); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); } }

Read full topic
